summary:
The document lists signatures of representatives of various countries to the United Nations: 
Pakistan - Ambassador Munir Akram, 
Philippines - Ambassador Lauro Baja, Jr., 
Romania - Ambassador Mihnea Motoc, 
Russian Federation - Ambassador Andrey Denisov, 
Spain - Ambassador Juan Antonio Yáñez-Barnuevo, 
United Kingdom - Ambassador Emyr Jones Parry, 
United States - Ambassador John Danforth.
